column1: | for kathryn foehrkalb wood river:kathryn foehrkalb
column6: at anderson hospital in maryville. she was born on november 3
column9: the daughter of the late john and rose dugan. she married jim foehrkalb and he preceded her in death. survivors include one granddaughter and her husband: mindy and kenny engler of holiday shores
column12: kelsey engler all of holiday shores
column13: and a good friend: judy jennings of east alton. she was formerly employed at defense mapping in st. louis for many years prior to her retirement. she was a member of holy angels parish in wood river. in addition to her parents
column14: she was preceded in death by one daughter: cathy tinsley and fourteen brothers and sisters. in accordance with her wishes
column15: cremation rites will be accorded. in celebration of her life
column16: memorial visitation will be from 12pm until time of memorial services at 1pm on sunday
column19: at pitchford funeral home in wood river. father james flach will officiate. memorials are suggested to partners for pets and will be accepted at the funeral home. to send flowers or a remembrance gift to the family of kathryn foehrkalb please visit our tribute store. upcoming events28. jun. sunday visitation12:00 pm - 1:00 pm pitchford funeral home2555 vaughn road
